Reference version 0.4.9

All functions

all_answered_questions hansard_all_answered_questions

Imports data on all answered parliamentary questions.

bill_stage_types hansard_bill_stage_types

bill_stage_types

bills hansard_bills

Imports data on House of Commons and House of Lords bills

commons_answered_questions hansard_commons_answered_questions

Imports data on House of Commons answered questions. If all parameters are left empty, imports all available answered questions in a tibble.

commons_division_date hansard_commons_division_date

Returns a tibble with the dates of House of Commons divisions.

commons_divisions hansard_commons_divisions

Imports data on House of Commons divisions.

commons_oral_question_times hansard_commons_oral_question_times

Imports data on House of Commons oral question times

commons_oral_questions hansard_commons_oral_questions

Imports data on House of Commons oral questions

commons_terms hansard_commons_terms

Imports the parliamentary thesaurus. The API is rate limited to 5500 requests at a time, so some use of parameters is required.

commons_written_questions hansard_commons_written_questions

Imports data in a tibble on House of Commons written questions.

constituencies hansard_constituencies

Imports data on House of Commons constituencies, returning a tibble of all current and former Westminster constituencies.

early_day_motions hansard_early_day_motions

Imports data on early day motions, including the content, signatories, and sponsors of early day motions.

election_candidates hansard_election_candidates

Returns the name of all candidates standing in an election.

election_results hansard_election_results

Imports data on general election and by-election results from the 2010 general election onwards.

elections hansard_elections

Imports data on general and by-elections from the 2010 General Election onwards.

epetition_tibble hansard_epetition_tibble

Get data on epetitions submitted to parliament, with the label, sponsor, number of signatures, date created and epetition ID.

epetition hansard_epetition

Imports data on a given epetition.

hansard_generic

Hansard - Generic API Function

hansard_tidy

A function to make the results of calls to the API easier to work with, mostly though fixing variable names, which by default contain non alpha-numeric characters and appear to use an inconsistent/idiosyncratic naming convention, at least by the standards of the various naming conventions used in R. Dates and datetimes are converted to POSIXct class. Some extra URL data included in the API is also stripped out.

hansard

hansard: Provides Easy Downloading Capabilities for the UK Parliament API

lord_vote_record hansard_lord_vote_record

Accepts an ID number for a member of the House of Commons, and returns a tibble of their votes.

lords_amendments hansard_lords_amendments

Imports data on House of Lords Amendments. Returns a tibble with all available House of Lords amendments.

lords_ammendments

Defunct parameters for hansard package

lords_attendance hansard_lords_attendance

Imports data on House of Lords attendance. Please note that the attendance data is not as tidy as some of the others that are accessible through this API, and so additional work to prepare this data in a way that you want may be required.

lords_divisions hansard_lords_divisions

Imports data on House of Lords divisions

lords_interests hansard_lords_interests

Registered interests of members of the House of Lords

lords_written_questions hansard_lords_written_questions

Imports data on House of Lords written questions

members_search hansard_members_search

Search for an MP or Lord by name and constituency

members hansard_members commons_members hansard_commons_members lords_members hansard_lords_members

Imports data on all current and former Members of Parliament including the Lords and the Commons

mp_edms hansard_mp_edms

Imports data on early day motions in signed, sponsored or primarily sponsored by a given MP.

mp_questions hansard_mp_questions

Accepts an ID number for a member of the House of Commons, and returns a tibble of of all their oral and written questions.

mp_vote_record hansard_mp_vote_record

Accepts an ID number for a member of the House of Commons, and returns a tibble of their votes.

papers_laid hansard_papers_laid

Imports data on papers laid before the House.

publication_logs hansard_publication_logs

Imports data on House of Commons and House of Lords publications.

research_topics_list hansard_research_topics_list research_subtopics_list hansard_research_subtopics_list research_types_list hansard_research_types_list

Functions to retrieve lists of research briefing topics, subtopics and types. These functions do not accept any arguments.

research_briefings hansard_research_briefings

Imports data on Parliamentary Research Briefings. To see a list of possible topics call research_topics_list or research_subtopics_list for both topics and subtopics. To see a list of briefing types, call research_types_list. This function can return results with newlines in the text of the abstract or description of the research briefing, represented as '\n'.

sessions_info hansard_sessions_info

Imports data on Parliamentary Sessions. Note that due to the date format used by the API, if days==TRUE and the end_date and start_date parameters are not set to the default values, the function downloads all available data and then subsets the tibble between the two given dates.

tv_programmes hansard_tv_programmes tv_clips hansard_tv_clips tv_channels hansard_tv_channels

Imports data on TV broadcasts.
